answers.answer: Your mother having diabetes will make her recovery slower.  She is doing well if she is up walking already.  The main thing is that she heals well.  Being diabetic could make the healing process slower.  It takes about a year to recover from open heart surgery for an average person.  She has been through a lot and may need time to regain her strength.
